_acceptOwner().details: Accepts the admin rights, but only for pendingOwenr.

_setEligibilityManager(address).details: Admin function, only owner can call this

_setPendingOwner(address).details: Transfer contract control to a new owner. The newPendingOwner must call `_acceptOwner` to finish the transfer.

params._borrowedAmount: The amount of underlying being borrowed

params._mintedAmount: The amount of iToken being minted
params._minter: The account which would get the minted tokens

params._redeemAmount: The amount of iToken being redeemed

params._iToken: The iToken being repaid #param _payer The account which would repay
params._repayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaied

params._iTokenCollateral: The collateral iToken to be seized #param _iTokenBorrowed The iToken was borrowed
params._liquidator: The account which has repaid and seized
params._seizedAmount: The amount of collateral being seized

NewEligibilityManager(address,address).notice: Emitted Eligibility Manager address is changed by admin

_setPendingOwner(address).notice: Base on the inputing parameter `newPendingOwner` to check the exact error reason.

afterBorrow(address,address,uint256).notice: Hook function after iToken `borrow()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails

afterFlashloan(address,address,uint256).notice: Hook function after iToken `flashloan()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails #param _iToken The iToken was flashloaned #param _to The account flashloan transfer to #param _amount  The amount was flashloaned

afterLiquidateBorrow(address,address,add.notice: Hook function after iToken `liquidateBorrow()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails #param _iTokenBorrowed The iToken was borrowed #param _iTokenCollateral The collateral iToken to be seized #param _liquidator The account which would repay and seize #param _borrower The account which has borrowed #param _repaidAmount  The amount of underlying being repaied #param _seizedAmount  The amount of collateral being seized

afterMint(address,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Hook function after iToken `mint()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails

afterRedeem(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Hook function after iToken `redeem()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails

afterRepayBorrow(address,address,address.notice: Hook function after iToken `repayBorrow()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails

afterSeize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Hook function after iToken `seize()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails

afterTransfer(address,address,address,ui.notice: Hook function after iToken `transfer()` Will `revert()` if any operation fails

claimAllReward(address[]).notice: Claim reward accrued in all iTokens by the holders

claimRewards(address[],address[],address.notice: Claim reward accrued in iTokens by the holders

eligibilityManager().notice: the Eligibility Manager address where to query the eligibility of accounts

eligibleTotalBorrow(address).notice: the Eligible Total Borrow Balance of each iToken

eligibleTotalSupply(address).notice: the Eligible Total Supply of each iToken

isRewardDistributorManager().notice: Ensure this is a RewardDistributorManager contract.
